name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Chinese who went to Russia to join the army wrote in his diary: "Today I got the news that the United States will no longer provide military assistance to Ukraine. The United States's no longer supporting will bring this war to an end in 2025. The Ukrainian Nazi fascists will eventually die in the beautiful dream that capitalism has created for them." He also revealed in his diary that as the weather gets colder, it becomes more and more difficult to supply materials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The uncle of the student who fell from the building accused the relevant departments of not letting the parents know the truth.
In another live broadcast room, viewers in the comment area called on the people of Shaanxi to unite and make a big deal out of the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of people gathered in front of the school to seek justice for the student who fell from the building. The slogan at the school gate read "Develop vocational education, I support you - Xi Jinping"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the platform is gradually deleting videos of Pucheng Vocational School residents defending their rights and seeking justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Fv4a98c0iH

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This video is reproduced from station b

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, a store in Guangzhou issued 101 first prizes for the Double Color Ball.
Some netizens discovered that the 101 first prizes of the lottery store were divided into three tickets, two 50 single-number tickets, and one 6+16 compound ticket.
It was rumored that these two 50 tickets were bought by one person, and the boss thought he was going for the second prize (all 6 red balls of the Double Color Ball, but the last blue ball was not hit, it is the second prize), so he bought the same first 6 digits, and the 7th digit included all blue balls. This way, he can definitely win the first prize.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television issued a notice on the implementation of the "Micro-Short Drama +" action plan to empower thousands of industries:
In 25 years, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television will thoroughly organize and implement micro-short drama creation plans including travel, learning law, brand building, learning classics, popular science and watching intangible cultural heritage. In the subdivided fields, a total of 300 key micro-short dramas with leading roles and innovative value will be launched to create a batch of high-quality micro-short dramas with profound thoughts and exquisite art
Comment netizens are mostly not optimistic

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: To boost the economy, we should not only focus on cities, but also tap the potential of rural areas. If rural housing land enters the market, the annual market value will reach 1.3 trillion yuan, according to conservative estimates. -- Lian Ping, Chairman of the China Chief Economists Forum, at the 2025 China Chief Economists Forum Annual Meeting in Shanghai on January 4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a kindergarten in Xuzhou, Jiangsu was exposed for washing dishes in the toilet for a long time.
Education Bureau: The problem was verified by monitoring and the kindergarten has been ordered to rectify.
Parents are not satisfied with this handling result: they only asked the kindergarten to rectify, but did not set a rectification period, nor did they rectify and investigate the kindergarten according to relevant regulations. At the same time, the school did not make any explanation or apology, which further aggravated the anger and worries of parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Public Resources Trading Network of Nanchong City, Sichuan Province, issued a notice of bid failure. Due to the difference of 1 cent in the bidding control price in different documents, the review of the 10 million yuan project of Tianchang Street Community Comprehensive Service Center in Yingshan County was terminated.
Restarting the bidding process may cost much more than 1 cent.
The announcement shows that the owner of the project is Chengnan Street Office of Yingshan County People's Government, and the bidding agency is Guang'an Yongwangfa Engineering Management Co., Ltd. A staff member of Chengnan Street said: "We strictly follow the bidding procedures. The agency made a low-level mistake, and the bidding list was not consistent with the bidding announcement."
A staff member of the bidding agency involved said frankly: "The reason for the failure of this bid is that the figures of the bidding control price in different documents differ by 1 cent, which may be caused by work errors. We have started to re-bid, and please pay attention to the latest information released on the official website in the future."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, due to a series of earthquakes in Yinchuan, Ningxia, some parents hoped that the school would be closed to ensure the safety of their children, and called on other parents to call the Education Bureau to pressure the school to suspend classes.
This behavior was criticized by other parents, who said that these parents' behavior was incitement. It is suspected that some of the parents who made suggestions were from other places, which was also criticized by Yinchuan parents in the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On the evening of January 5, a large number of people spontaneously gathered in front of Pucheng Vocational School to support the students who fell to their death. During this period, the police carried out violent arrests. The parents of the students who fell to their death were placed under house arrest in a hotel by the vocational school during this period, and the school teachers stood at the door of the room to monitor them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, a wildfire broke out near the Shiniu Reservoir in Gangbei District, Guigang City, Guangxi, very close to the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens filmed what they suspected to be several security guards of Pucheng Vocational College dragging a person into the school and beating him. It was reported online that the person being beaten was the uncle of the student who fell from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Cases from the first episode of the documentary "Anti-Corruption for the People" by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection:
1. Audacious! Corrupt officials posted their personal payment codes in the service hall
2. They embezzled 230,000 yuan from campus meals at a dime
3. Self-deception! Corrupt officials returned one or two bundles every time they collected money, and said they couldn't give so much money while collecting money
Zhou Xiaojian, the former director of the Housing Maintenance Fund Service Office of Dong'an County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province, was in huge debt due to speculation and had the idea of embezzling funds. He customized fake receipts to deceive the public, and even printed out his personal payment QR code while on duty and placed it at the payment window of the government service hall. Zhou Xiaojian embezzled a total of more than 9.93 million yuan in special housing maintenance funds, misappropriated more than 1.72 million yuan, and issued more than 3,000 fake tickets.

Qi Shiguo, the former logistics director of the Seventh Primary School in Qikai District, Changchun City, Jilin Province, reached an agreement with the Jilin Golf Catering Management Company, which was responsible for catering, to give the then school principal 8 yuan per meal from the meal fee of each student...
fullContent:
中央纪监委《反腐为了人民》纪录片第一集案例：
1.胆大妄为！贪官把个人收款码贴在办事大厅
2.从校园餐里1毛钱1毛钱贪了23万
3.自欺欺人！贪官每次收钱都退回一两捆，贪官一边收钱一边说不能给这么多
湖南永州市东安县房屋维修资金服务办公室原主任周小健，因投机行为背上巨额债务，打起了挪用资金的主意。他定做假收据蒙骗群众，甚至在值班时直接把个人收款二维码打印出来，放在政府办事大厅缴费窗口。周小健共计贪污房屋专项维修资金993万余元、挪用172万余元，开出假票3000多张。

吉林省长春市汽开区第七小学原后勤主任戚世国，与负责配餐的吉林高尔夫餐饮管理公司达成约定，从学生每人每餐8块钱餐费里，给时任校长、后勤主任两人各1毛钱回扣。后来校园餐费涨到每人每餐12元，回扣也增加到了每人每餐3毛钱。从2010年8月至2019年12月，9年多时间里，高尔夫餐饮管理公司从学生餐费里克扣了70余万元用于单位行贿，其中戚世国一人就收受23万余元。

四川射洪市农业农村局原党组书记张朝平，把高标准农田项目拿来和商人老板做交易，收受贿赂400余万元。2017年，建筑商人罗江认识了张朝平，时常邀请张朝平吃吃喝喝，主动为其各种应酬买单。张朝平随后就向下属推荐了罗江，导致高标准农田项目从招投标到施工、验收的各个监管环节都流于形式。
每次收罗江的钱时，张朝平都要拿出一两捆来还给罗江，口头上要求他不能克扣工程质量，用这种掩耳盗铃的做法，作为收钱时心理上的遮羞布。“我有时跟他说不能给那么多，工程质量这个肯定是大计。”
事实上，村里水渠断裂、土地不平、机械下不了田，即便是自己家乡的土地受害，张朝平也因吃人嘴短拿人手软，不敢面对问题。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, the Maoming Marathon site was hung with advertising banners for having three children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a third-grade student from Lingshan Town Primary School in Haikou City died in school after school for no reason. He had multiple fractures and a dislocated arm. The school refused to allow the parents to view the surveillance camera because the surveillance camera was damaged.
The parents held up a sign to seek information from those who knew about the incident and clear their son's name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6, Pucheng, Shaanxi. People continued to take to the streets and go to school to speak out for the child who fell from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Korean couple was beaten by Chinese people just because they dissuaded them from smoking indoors. According to Korean media reports, six Chinese people at Dalin Chinese Restaurant were eating and smoking at a barbecue restaurant in Seoul. A Korean couple couldn't stand it and asked them to smoke outside. Unexpectedly, one of them said, "What's so great about Koreans? Can't they even smoke?" and then they beat the couple together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, Xinzhou residents posted online that they had been without water since January 2. Due to high-speed rail construction, Xinzhou City originally planned to renovate the water supply trunk line from January 2 to 6:00 on January 4, and the water supply would be cut off for two days. However, the water supply has not been restored until the 6th, and some residents have been without water for 6 days. The water supply restoration time has been changed repeatedly in multiple announcements.
Some netizens joked that the water supply company is spreading rumors

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local residents complained: Xinzhou residents have been without water for several days. This is a major accident concerning the water supply for the entire city, but there are only three workers working at the repair site.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, a search found that the official website of Nezha Automobile could no longer be accessed normally. The page after opening it showed "System maintenance, please try again later". 
Previously, in November 2024, Nezha Automobile was exposed to large-scale layoffs and factory shutdowns; on December 6, Nezha Automobile announced that due to company strategy, Zhang Yong would no longer serve as CEO and would become a company consultant. Founder and Chairman Fang Yunzhou would serve as CEO concurrently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens reported that the live broadcast rooms in Pucheng are blocked one by one, and the live broadcast was blocked at the end of the video. Netizens reported that in the live broadcast rooms opened by local people in Pucheng, regardless of whether they were related to the student death incident, netizens asked about the situation outside the school in the comment area, resulting in many live broadcast rooms being blocked, and the anchors had to convey their opinions to the audience in an obscure way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The headquarters of Xi'an Greenland Group was occupied by migrant workers demanding their wages. The migrant workers slept on the floor of Greenland Group for many days to demand their wages. Behind them were posters welcoming the New Year.
It is worth noting that Greenland Group is a state-owned enterprise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a blogger compared the past and present Spring Festival Galas, and complained that the present Spring Festival Gala was all about making dumplings and forced sentimentality, which was awkward from beginning to end. In contrast, the past Spring Festival Gala was all about humor and satire on the current social situation.
The video was deleted by the platform after receiving 122,000 likes, but netizens who had already recorded the video forwarded it one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, at the gate of Pucheng Vocational Education Center, ordinary people who went to the school to support the student who fell to his death for no reason broke through the police wall and entered the school.
The video shows that during the attack, several men were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, at Pucheng Vocational Education Center, people who showed their support for the student who fell to his death for no reason were not afraid of the police and security guards. They worked together to push open the school gate and open a path for the people behind to enter the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video Supplement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Pucheng, Shaanxi reported a vocational school student falling from a building: before the incident, he had a verbal argument and physical conflict with a first-year student from the same school; the public security authorities determined that the student died from falling from a high altitude, and a criminal case has been ruled out for now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 5, Zigong, Sichuan. The Fushun County Education and Sports Bureau was reported online to be recruiting interns. The recruitment information stated that the work intensity was high, they might have to stay up late, and interns would not receive any salary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, in Nantong, Jiangsu, the owners of Changjiang Yinzhenyuan Community reported that the water company missed reading two water meters, totaling more than 200,000 yuan in water fees. However, without any explanation or prior notice, the water company and the property management company deducted the water fee from the water fee accounts of the community owners every month, and asked the owners to share the missed fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Angry people rushed forward and beat the vice-principal of Pucheng Vocational School. Some people waved the national flag at the scene, and special police holding shields were at the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 6 (Release) People's Daily staff published an article, angrily accusing the Chongqing Propaganda Department of seizing the operating rights of the "Chongqing Release" account.
The staff member said that they spent 8 years, and the team worked 22 hours a day during the 3-year epidemic to cultivate the "Chongqing Release" account into an account with tens of millions of users, but the Chongqing Propaganda Department ignored the survival of the account operation team and secretly changed the password to take away the account operation rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the conflict between the people who came to Pucheng Vocational Education to seek justice and the police has further escalated. People threw stones at the police, and some people sprayed the police with fire extinguishers. During the period, several policemen beat the people who fell to the ground with batons. Many people were injured in the conflict, and one policeman was beaten to the ground by the people and could not get up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A large number of fully armed police officers holding shields entered the school to maintain stability. The police beat the people with batons, and the people and the police pushed each other.
It was rumored online that Dang Changxin did not fall from the building, but was pushed down by other students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, Russia Today RT reported that the number of countries boycotting the US dollar has exceeded the number of countries supporting the US dollar, but it did not list the data.
According to the latest data from the International Monetary Fund (IMF), 59% of the countries in the world currently use the US dollar as foreign exchange reserves; the latest report of the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) in the first three quarters of 2024 shows that 88% of global foreign exchange transactions are tied to the US dollar, and the proportion has increased.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 5, in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, a porridge shop owner posted a video saying that a woman came into the store many times and took the buns and broke them open. One time, she even broke more than a dozen buns in the store in a row and claimed to be from the Industrial and Commercial Bureau. In the video, the woman said: Your food cannot be eaten, who wants to eat your food.
Sina Hotspot reported the incident, but the video was later deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Among the people injured in the conflict, a girl was covered in blood and a man fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A plainclothes officer was beating people in the crowd and was picked out and beaten by the angry people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A dusty man was handcuffed behind his back by the police, but the police who handcuffed him were nowhere to be found. The man shouted, "Police, do you still have the people in your hearts?" Many others were sprayed with pepper spray by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Angry people chased the police with sticks, and the police fled in panic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police kicked the people and then dragged them away. The people shouted: "They are beating people! The police are beating people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, while a large number of Pucheng residents were confronting the police for justice, Lu Han was on the hot search headlines on Weibo for using foul language and giving the middle finger during a live broadcast.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The people questioned the police why they beat the students, and the angry people forced the police to retreat again and again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Several policemen violently beat civilians with sticks, and people around them threw stones at the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The family of the student Dang Changxin who fell from the building burned paper money at the school, and then threw paper money from the rooftop, and the flying paper money fell like snowflakes.
There were also angry people who smashed the school door glass with fire extinguishers, and some people simply climbed up the school wall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the roads around Pucheng Vocational School have been blocked by police cordons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When several policemen tried to take a woman away, the people around them came forward to rescue her but were chased and beaten by the police with batons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Angry people threw stones at the police, forcing them to retreat again and again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Several policemen beat a man with batons. One of the policemen slapped the man on the head with his hand and then hit him on the head with his baton. This scene was captured by citizens in the distance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some people were taken away from the scene, and the people shouted in unison, "Release them!" "Release them!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
💡We announce a strategic partnership with the decentralized social platform @YakiHonne to jointly explore the possibility of decentralized news.
@YakiHonne uses decentralized technology to ensure that news content cannot be deleted. On centralized platforms, accounts may be banned at any time, content may be censored, and the truth needs a safer destination. "Teacher Li is not your teacher" takes the lead in moving towards decentralization and creating an independent news model that cannot be shut down or deleted.

To this end, we will open a decentralized account on @YakiHonne to synchronize news and jointly protect the freedom and independence of news! 

Why choose @YakiHonne? 
YakiHonne is a decentralized social media client based on the Nostr protocol. In terms of content, YakiHonne has integrated Bitcoin, decentralized protocols and technologies, We...
fullContent:
💡我们宣布与去中心化社交平台@YakiHonne达成战略合作，共同探索去中心化新闻的可能性。
@YakiHonne借助去中心化技术，确保新闻内容无法被删除。在中心化平台，账号随时可能被封禁，内容可能遭受审查，而真相需要一个更安全的归宿。 「李老师不是你老师」率先迈向去中心化，打造不可关停、不可删除的独立新闻模式。

为此，我们将在@YakiHonne上开设一个同步新闻的去中心化账号，共同守护新闻的自由与独立性！  

为什么选择@YakiHonne？ 
YakiHonne 是一款基于 Nostr 协议的去中心化社交媒体客户端，在内容方面，YakiHonne 从比特币、去中心化协议与技术、Web3，区块链及加密货币等专业方向起步，逐步扩展至时政、经济、娱乐、体育、音乐等多种主题，覆盖面广，功能丰富。

相比现有的去中心化社交和存储协议，YakiHonne 拥有以下突出优势：  

匿名性：用户无需绑定手机号或邮箱即可注册，只需一键生成密钥，便可实现完全匿名发声，充分保障隐私安全。  

抗审查：内容存储于去中心化网络，无法被删除或封禁，用户真正掌控自己的数据所有权，享受无审查的自由。  

用户友好：作为Nostr生态中最受欢迎的客户端，YakiHonne是唯一支持中文的应用。其界面简洁直观，符合大多数互联网用户的使用习惯，吸引了来自全球170多个国家的用户。  

功能全面：支持短推、长文、视频等多样化社交功能，同时提供点对点加密交流。社区成员还能匿名参与新闻真伪验证，共同维护内容的可信度。  

YakiHonne 打破了中心化平台的局限，为用户提供真正意义上的言论自由与数据自主权。   

比特币支持的原生协议 理念一致：Nostr 是比特币社区支持的协议，与比特币生态深度融合，共同强调去中心化和用户自主权。  

自由发声的工具：Nostr 是人类历史上首次通过技术手段实现真正言论自由的协议，深受倡导自由表达的社区认可与支持。  Nostr 以其独特的去中心化架构、用户自主权及与比特币生态的紧密结合，成为去中心化社交协议的最佳选择，是真正符合未来趋势的社交基础设施。

中心化平台存在封号、限流、删除内容等诸多潜在风险，而 $Li 迫切需要一个不可审查、不可删除的稳定渠道。  

通过去中心化平台@YakiHonne，全球自由职业者可以突破中心化平台在流量与收益上的束缚，真正实现言论自由与经济自主。  

📲 如何在 YakiHonne 关注我们？

1. 下载 YakiHonne或登录网页版

• Android:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the evening, the people confronted the fully armed police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Even though it was late at night, the police still did not dare to let their guard down. The people confronted the police who formed a human wall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @YakiHonne Follow our YakiHonne account by clicking on the link

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After being beaten by angry people, the vice-principal leaned against an iron bar and gasped weakly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the latest data from the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention, the influenza virus positivity rate continues to rise. Mabaloxavir has become a new generation of influenza miracle drug. The price of a single tablet exceeds 100 yuan, and it has been sold out in some places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, Shanghai Securities News published an article: "True power is never about controlling everything, but about allowing everything. Good night~" 
The post was later deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, the U.S. Embassy in China issued a "Statement on the Birthday of Aikebai Aisati". Aikebai Aisati was sentenced for inciting ethnic hatred. It calls on the Chinese government to immediately and unconditionally release the innocent Uyghur Aikebai Aisati.
The anti-American voices in the Weibo comment area continued, and the "China-U.S. friendship" comments a few days ago have disappeared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Japanese media reported that on January 3, a 25-year-old Chinese man living in Tokyo asked a hotel in Hokkaido to prepare a window seat for him at breakfast.
The staff refused and told him that the seats were in the order of arrival, so reservations could not be made.
The next day, the man found that the hotel did not meet his request, so he shouted "Why?" and beat the hotel staff.
The man was arrested at the airport and said: I just pushed him, I didn't hit him

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Tianjin, a 19-year-old girl took a private ride through the Dida platform. She was left on the highway by the driver because she refused the driver's detour to do private business, which caused heated discussion.
Afterwards, the police reported that the driver had been detained. The Dida platform issued a statement on the situation, and the driver's account had been banned. The statement mentioned that the passenger did not arrive at the boarding location at the specified time and was nearly 20 minutes late. The driver repeatedly reminded her to take the car as soon as possible or she would miss the plane. The girl said that if she missed the plane, she could change the ticket. In the end, the passenger disagreed with the driver getting off the highway to get something, and the two sides quarreled. The girl was left on the highway by the driver.
Secondly, the girl ordered a private ride. Before getting on the car, the driver contacted the girl and said that there were relatives and friends in the car. If she didn't mind, he could reduce the highway fee for her by 15 yuan. The girl agreed, but after getting on the car, the girl found that the so-called relatives were hitchhikers.
In addition, in the police report, the driver Li humiliated the woman...
fullContent:
近日，天津，一名19岁女生通过“嘀嗒”平台打独享顺风车，因拒绝司机绕路办私事，被司机丢在高速上，引发热议。
 事后公安通报：司机已被行拘。“滴答”平台发布情况说明，司机账号已被封禁，说明中提到：乘客未按照规定时间到达乘车地点，又迟到了近20分钟，司机一再提醒她尽快乘车否则会赶不上飞机，女生则表示如果赶不上飞机可以改签机票，最后乘客因不同意司机下高速拿东西，双方发生争吵，女生被司机丢在高速上。
 其次，女生下单的是独享顺风车，上车前司机联系女生表示，车上有亲友，如果她不介意，可以为她减少15元的高速费，女生答应，但女生上车后发现所谓亲属，是顺风乘客。
 此外，在警方通报中，司机李某某对女子进行辱骂，并将车停在了高速公路应急车道，强行将该女生拉拽下车后驶离现场。
 女生将此事发布到网络后，舆论一边倒的指责司机，但平台公布全程录音后，部分人开始指责女生“小仙女”先迟到再先，而且对司机要求顺路办事请求反应过度。
 也有网友表示，女生打的车是独享顺风车，车主接到独享订单后，就不能再接顺路订单。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police report:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Girl injured in Pucheng clashes

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 4, Wuhan, Hubei. A "butter bear" carries a candied haws on his back and sells it on the street. However, under the hood is a 152cm tall man named "Bagu La (net name)". Bagu La was born with bone defects and has encountered difficulties in finding a job. In order not to scare others, he wears a hood to set up a stall to supplement his family income. On January 2, he said that he was chased away by the urban management again, and the windshield of his electric car was also stolen. He hopes that the urban management will not chase him away tomorrow. January 4: Life is so hard, I can't bear it anymore.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Angry people smashed the office of Pucheng Vocational School.
The vice principal was beaten unconscious by the people.
The people surrounded the police, and the police gathered together to protect themselves with shields.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement: 
Angry people threw stones at the police, forcing them to retreat again and again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 4, in Nanping, Fujian, a man stabbed a girl repeatedly with a pair of scissors on the street. The girl was then taken to the hospital in an ambulance while the man stood by and watched, insulting passers-by who were filming.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The cafeteria was also smashed and looted by the public, and several young people sprayed fire extinguishers at the cafeteria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States announced new cybersecurity sanctions against Yongxin Zhicheng Technology Group on January 3. The statement on the U.S. Treasury website said the Chinese company was involved in multiple computer intrusions against American victims.
A U.S. State Department spokesperson issued a statement. The statement said the company is a large contractor for the government of the People's Republic of China and is associated with the Ministry of State Security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russian Satellite News Agency: Russians' average IQ ranks sixth in the world, while Ukraine ranks last in Europe.
China ranks first with an average national IQ of 107.43; Iran ranks second, and Russia ranks sixth, ranking first among European countries.
The United States ranks 27th, while Ukraine ranks last among European countries, ranking 78th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chunghwa Telecom and the Taiwan Coast Guard said the Chinese freighter Shunxing 39 damaged a communications cable near Keelung Port on the morning of January 3. The ship has sailed to South Korea. Taiwan has asked South Korea to assist in the investigation. The ship flies the Cameroon flag, but Taiwanese officials said the freighter is registered in Hong Kong and the only registered supervisor is Chinese citizen Guo Wenjie (transliteration)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Goldman Sachs: China's real estate sales reached 18.2 trillion at its peak in 2021, contributing 14% of GDP.
Sales fell to 8.7 trillion in 2024, contributing 7% of GDP.
Sales are expected to continue to shrink to 7.8 trillion in 2027, contributing 5% of GDP.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chunghwa Telecom and the Taiwan Coast Guard said the Chinese cargo ship Shunxing 39 damaged a communications cable near Keelung Port on the morning of January 3. The ship has sailed to South Korea. Taiwan has asked South Korea to assist in the investigation. The ship flies the Cameroon flag, but Taiwanese officials said it belongs to Jieyang Trading Co., Ltd., whose owner is Chinese citizen Guo Wenjie (sound).
